3777.verse: وَذَلَّلْنَـٰهَا|And We have tamed them|192|223|14546$لَهُمْ|for them,|81|144|98$فَمِنْهَا|so some of them -|142|205|14547$رَكُوبُهُمْ|they ride them,|122|153|14548$وَمِنْهَا|and some of them|139|364|6331$يَأْكُلُونَ|they eat.|86|311|2469$

3778.verse: وَلَهُمْ|And for them|106|135|71$فِيهَا|therein|66|124|253$مَنَـٰفِعُ|(are) benefits|111|169|12078$وَمَشَارِبُ‌ۖ|and drinks,|110|168|14549$أَفَلَا|so (will) not|99|128|452$يَشْكُرُونَ|they give thanks?|138|138|6484$

3779.verse: وَٱتَّخَذُواْ|But they have taken|156|163|10857$مِن دُونِ|besides|101|115|224$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|67|2$ءَالِهَةً|gods,|72|86|5479$لَّعَلَّهُمْ|that they may|115|129|1621$يُنصَرُونَ|be helped.|110|117|477$

3780.verse: لَا|Not|43|61|30$يَسْتَطِيعُونَ|they are able|124|160|2457$نَصْرَهُمْ|to help them,|109|145|14550$وَهُمْ|but they -|89|125|256$لَهُمْ|for them|76|112|98$جُندٌ|(are) host(s)|106|124|14551$مُّحْضَرُونَ|(who will) be brought.|166|166|13710$

3781.verse: فَلَا|So (let) not|98|105|208$يَحْزُنكَ|grieve you|89|103|3528$قَوْلُهُمْ‌ۘ|their speech.|107|121|7526$إِنَّا|Indeed, We|96|110|120$نَعْلَمُ|[We] know|92|106|3481$مَا|what|53|67|262$يُسِرُّونَ|they conceal|106|113|743$وَمَا|and what|82|324|46$يُعْلِنُونَ|they declare.|108|350|744$

3783.verse: وَضَرَبَ|And he sets forth|136|148|14552$لَنَا|for Us|59|82|338$مَثَلاً|an example|94|117|261$وَنَسِىَ|and forgets|96|119|10861$خَلْقَهُۥ‌ۖ|his (own) creation.|146|169|11457$قَالَ|He says,|77|89|309$مَن|`Who|57|77|76$يُحْىِ|will give life|96|136|2306$ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ|(to) the bones|117|158|12233$وَهِىَ|while they|88|128|2320$رَمِيمٌ|(are) decomposed?`|155|175|14553$

3786.verse: أَوَلَيْسَ|Is it not|82|93|14558$ٱلَّذِى|(He) Who|83|105|138$خَلَقَ|created|71|93|299$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|137|351$وَٱلْأَرْضَ|and the earth|111|133|2280$بِقَـٰدِرٍ|Able|70|92|14559$عَلَىٰٓ|to|63|74|52$أَن|[that]|60|70|655$يَخْلُقَ|create|71|91|10558$مِثْلَهُم‌ۚ|(the) like of them.|141|161|10559$بَلَىٰ|Yes, indeed!|102|122|772$وَهُوَ|and He|66|86|305$ٱلْخَلَّـٰقُ|(is) the Supreme Creator|185|195|9841$ٱلْعَلِيمُ|the All-Knower.|122|122|342$

3788.verse: فَسُبْحَـٰنَ|So glorified be|114|129|11753$ٱلَّذِى|(He) Who|83|112|138$بِيَدِهِۦ|in Whose hand|117|146|2122$مَلَكُوتُ|is (the) dominion|131|160|12357$كُلِّ|(of) all|64|93|185$شَىْءٍ|things,|69|84|186$وَإِلَيْهِ|and to Him|91|305|2165$تُرْجَعُونَ|you will be returned.|156|370|297$

3776.verse: Do they not see that We have created for them from what Our hands have made, grazing livestock, and [then] they are their owners?

3777.verse: And We have tamed them for them, so some of them they ride, and some of them they eat.

3778.verse: And for them therein are [other] benefits and drinks, so will they not be grateful?

3779.verse: But they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that perhaps they would be helped.

3780.verse: They are not able to help them, and they [themselves] are for them soldiers in attendance.

3781.verse: So let not their speech grieve you. Indeed, We know what they conceal and what they declare.

3782.verse: Does man not consider that We created him from a [mere] sperm-drop - then at once he is a clear adversary?

3783.verse: And he presents for Us an example and forgets his [own] creation. He says, "Who will give life to bones while they are disintegrated?"

3784.verse: Say, "He will give them life who produced them the first time; and He is, of all creation, Knowing."

3785.verse: [It is] He who made for you from the green tree, fire, and then from it you ignite.

3786.verse: Is not He who created the heavens and the earth Able to create the likes of them? Yes, [it is so]; and He is the Knowing Creator.

3787.verse: His command is only when He intends a thing that He says to it, "Be," and it is.

3788.verse: So exalted is He in whose hand is the realm of all things, and to Him you will be returned.
